skill.name: frontend-design
skill.description: Create distinctive, production-grade frontend interfaces with high design quality. Use this skill when the user asks to build web components, pages, artifacts, posters, or applications (examples include websites, landing pages, dashboards, React components, HTML/CSS layouts, or when styling/beautifying any web UI). Generates creative, polished code and UI design that avoids generic AI aesthetics.

skill.author: Azeem-2

security_audit.summary: This is a pure prompt-based skill containing only markdown documentation and design guidelines. No executable code, scripts, network calls, filesystem access, or command execution capabilities exist. All 58 static findings are false positives triggered by legal terminology in the Apache license and documentation text.

content.value_statement: Users struggle to generate frontend code that stands out from generic AI-generated designs. This skill guides the creation of memorable, production-quality interfaces with bold aesthetics, thoughtful typography, and polished visual details.
actual_capabilities: Design landing pages and full applications
Implement bold typography and color systems
Build dashboards and data visualization layouts
limitations: Does not connect to external design APIs or services
Does not generate backend code or server-side components
Does not access or modify existing project files directly

use_cases.title: Rapid prototype production UI
use_cases.description: Generate polished frontend components and pages that are production-ready and visually distinctive

use_cases.title: Transform concepts into code
use_cases.description: Convert design concepts into working HTML/CSS/JS or React implementations with careful attention to aesthetics

use_cases.title: Build complete frontend interfaces
use_cases.description: Create complete user interfaces including landing pages, dashboards, and interactive web applications

prompt_templates.title: Simple component
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a button component for a coffee shop website with bold typography and warm colors using a brutalist aesthetic.

prompt_templates.title: Full landing page
prompt_templates.prompt: Build a complete landing page for a SaaS startup. Include hero section, features grid, testimonials, and CTA. Use a maximalist design with custom typography.

prompt_templates.title: Dashboard interface
prompt_templates.prompt: Design a dashboard interface for analytics with charts, tables, and navigation. Use a clean, functional aesthetic with subtle animations.

prompt_templates.title: Interactive application
prompt_templates.prompt: Create an interactive portfolio web application with React. Include smooth animations, hover states, and responsive layout.

output_examples.input: Create a card component for a coffee shop website with bold typography and warm colors
output: Production-ready React component with inline styles or CSS modules
Custom font selection with warm color palette
CSS animations for hover states and micro-interactions
Accessibility considerations with aria labels and keyboard navigation

output_examples.input: Design a landing page for a creative agency
output: Complete HTML/CSS layout with hero section
Features grid with custom icon styling
Call-to-action section with interactive hover states
Responsive breakpoints for mobile and tablet

output_examples.input: Build an analytics dashboard with charts and data tables
output: Data visualization components with CSS charts
Tables with sortable headers and pagination
Dark theme option with smooth color transitions

best_practices: Provide clear context about purpose, audience, and brand identity for better results
Specify aesthetic direction like minimalist, brutalist, or retro-futuristic to guide design choices
Mention technical constraints like framework preference, browser support, or performance requirements
anti_patterns: Requesting generic designs without specifying an aesthetic direction
Asking for production deployment without considering accessibility and performance
Neglecting to specify responsive requirements for mobile and tablet views

faq.question: What frameworks does this skill support?
faq.answer: Supports React, Vue, vanilla HTML/CSS/JS, and other modern frontend frameworks. Specify preference in prompt.

faq.question: Can this skill modify existing project files?
faq.answer: The skill generates code but does not directly modify files. Copy output into your project.

faq.question: Does this skill connect to external APIs or services?
faq.answer: No external connections are made. All code is generated locally based on your specifications.

faq.question: What types of designs work best with this skill?
faq.answer: Bold, distinctive designs with clear aesthetic direction. More specific vision yields better results.

faq.question: How do I get accessibility-compliant output?
faq.answer: Mention accessibility requirements in your prompt. Skill includes proper semantic HTML and ARIA attributes.

faq.question: How is this different from generic code generators?
faq.answer: This skill intentionally avoids generic AI aesthetics using bold design choices and production-quality code.
